contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 29, 1990 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £125 and trophy, 2nd £75 and shield, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed. 32nd annual contest.
Nov. 14, 2014, 11:54 a.m. March 29, 2017, 6:38 p.m.
1 Bakewell Silver Band G. T. Jones
2 Heage Band Tom Street
3 Dinnington Colliery Band Steve Johnson
Unknown Result Ashover Brass Band J. Slater
Unknown Result Goldthorpe Band Brian Till
Unknown Result Welbeck Estates Band Mark Wilcockson
Unknown Result Derby Railways Chris Jeans
Withdrawn Oughtibridge Band Derek Renshaw
